display_long_description:
DancingArrow is a VR rhythm action game that lets you dance to the electrifying beats of K-POP and enjoy the rhythm with your whole body!
Experience the joy of dancing and realistic action that goes beyond just a rhythm game.
When you dance, the beat is complete!

🔥 Game features
🎵 1. A collection of K-POP's biggest hits!
Play popular songs by K-POP stars that have captivated the world!
* Over 30 different tracks
* New K-POP songs updated every 9 weeks!

🏹 2. Perfect blend of rhythm and action!
Get in the flow of the music as you accurately hit the flying arrows in time to the beat.
* Colorful visual effects and the feeling of hitting
* Performance effects that depend on your rhythm and timing

💃 3. VR performance that moves like you're dancing!
By applying key points of real-life choreography, your dance will come naturally as you play the game.
* Fantastic collaboration between game and dance
* After playing, you are already a star on stage!

🎮 4. Intuitive gameplay for everyone to enjoy
* Multiple difficulty levels to choose from: EASY, NORMAL, HARD
* Simple and intuitive controls that even VR beginners can easily enjoy

🌍 5. Global leaderboards and endless challenges
* Compete your score with users around the world
* Become the best rhythm master and conquer the global rankings!
